trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Red Lion
There were no other sightings in Red Lion on or around January 7th 2012
divs: sighting detailsme and a buddy of mine were standing around a fire at 1:30am saturday night enjoying the beautiful weather we`ve been having here in south central pennsylvania. i had to retreve something from my garage when i looked over to the west and seen a aspirin sized yellow\orange colored object low in the sky. i got out my smart phone and opend up the google skymap app to see if it was a rising planet or something. according to the skymap app there wasnt anything there but a few minor stars. i decided to go get my binoculars and check it out. i rested the binoculars on a tree branch so the image was steady. when looking at the object i was amazed by what i was seeing. i was a beautiful pale white color, almost the same color as the moon itself. inside of the glow was a defined, perfectly round sphere with sort of a patterned or textured surface. even though it was a few miles away i could still see the textured surface. after hovering about 5-7mins the object slowly decended below a tree line and was gone.
Summary: Observed Yellow-Orange Sphere Low in Sky...Red Lion PA
